name: The Faithful Circus Murder Case
description:
In this silly game you are a detective hired to solve a murder case in a circus. Your suspects are a duo of bunny magicians due to their strange behavior recently. Now by what YOU choose to figure out the murderer you can either save the circus or leave the murderer loose! 

This game was a school project I had to get done within 5 weeks. It might look a bit unpolished, but I might return afterwards and fix up & add up more stuff to it. I am a highschooler after all and I am really busy with schoolwork at the moment! My classmates are very excited on the game though, so I hope they enjoy it! 

Thanks to my silly mom and my friend Lunascathwolf for play testing the game for me!!! Along with many other people for support and play testing! :D

(Point & click murder mystery game basically)
